text.name: Congestion Cleanup
text.desc:
[WhenUse] At 3+ [Charge], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 6 [Charge] Count on self (max 2)

text.name: Boost: Elbow Blade
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain [ChargeForceField] equal to (2 + [Charge] Potency on self) (max 6, 1 per turn)
[WhenUse] Consume 6 [Charge] Count to gain +1 Coin Power

text.name: Boost: Elbow Blade
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain [ChargeForceField] equal to (2 + [Charge] Potency on self) (max 6, 1 per turn)
[WhenUse] Consume 6 [Charge] Count to gain +1 Coin Power

text.name: Boost: Elbow Blade
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain [ChargeForceField] equal to (2 + [Charge] Potency on self) (max 6, 1 per turn)
[WhenUse] Consume 6 [Charge] Count to gain +1 Coin Power
[WhenUse] At 3+ [Charge], Coin Power +1

text.name: Rip Space - CCA Overdrive
text.desc:
[StartBattle] If this unit has 3+ [Charge] Potency or less than 50% HP, convert all Coins in this Skill into [SuperCoin]
- If this unit loses a Clash while this effect is active, Final Power +3
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Charge] Count, consume 10 [Charge] Count to gain +4 Coin Power
coinDescs: [OnStartCoin] Consume up to 10 [Charge] Count to gain Coin Power for this Coin equal to ([Charge] Count consumed for this Coin)
[OnSucceedAttack] Deal Slash damage equal to ([Charge] Potency x 5)% of this Coin's final damage (max 25%)

text.name: Rip Space - CCA Overdrive
text.desc:
[StartBattle] If this unit has 3+ [Charge] Potency or less than 50% HP, convert all Coins in this Skill into [SuperCoin]
- If this unit loses a Clash while this effect is active, Final Power +3
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Charge] Count, consume 10 [Charge] Count to gain +4 Coin Power
[WhenUse] Gain Clash Power equal to [Charge] Potency on self (max 5)
coinDescs: [OnStartCoin] Consume up to 10 [Charge] Count to gain Coin Power for this Coin equal to ([Charge] Count consumed for this Coin)
[OnSucceedAttack] Deal Slash damage equal to ([Charge] Potency x 10)% of this Coin's final damage (max 50%)

text.name: CCA Overcharge
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] At less than 15 [Charge] Count, gain the following effects:
- Gain [WOverCharge] next turn (max 1 per turn)
- Turn End: Remove this unit's first Stagger Threshold (once per Encounter)

text.name: CCA Overcharge
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] At less than 15 [Charge] Count, gain the following effects:
- Gain [WOverCharge] next turn (max 1 per turn)
- Turn End: Remove this unit's first Stagger Threshold (once per Encounter)
- Turn End: Add 1 Rip Space - CCA Overdrive to the list of Skills for the next upcoming turn (once per turn)

1071321.name: One day I'll wear me Armour for Cancelled Trains
1071321.desc: - Combat Start: If the unit with the earliest Deployment Order gains [Charge] Count past the Max [Charge] Count Cap by using a Skill, the unit gains 1 [ChargeForceField] next turn for every [Charge] Count that exceeds the Max [Charge] Count Cap (max 3, including E.G.O Skills)

1071301.name: Defence-Oriented Charge
1071301.desc:
- Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
- Turn Start: Gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Charge] Potency on self (max 6)

1071311.name: Congestion Cleaning Armour
1071311.desc:
- Combat Start: If this unit has less than 50% HP, gain Shield equal to ([Charge] Potency x 5) (max 25)
- Immediately before getting hit, gain Shield equal to ([Charge] Potency on self) (max 5, 3 times per turn)
- If this unit gains [Charge] Count past the Max [Charge] Count Cap by using a Skill, the Skill deals +3% damage for every [Charge] Count that exceeds the Max [Charge] Count Cap (max 15%)

notes.short: Builds {status:Charge} Count with S1 or S2. Spends Count with S3. Use defense to immobilize him for a turn, but give him {status:Charge} Count, {status:ChargeForceField}, Power/Damage buffs, and a free use of his S3 on the succeeding turn. Defense also removes his first Stagger Threshold.
notes.full:
He gains {status:Charge} Count from his S1(+4) or his S2(+6). S2 also gives him {status:ChargeForceField} depending on his {status:Charge} Potency. His S3 consumes 10 {status:Charge} Count for +4 Coin Power. Its first 3 coins gives him additional {status:Charge} Count on Heads Hit, and its last coin consumes up to 10 additional {status:Charge} Count to gain even more Coin Power. S2 also consumes 6 Count when available. He gains 1 {status:Charge} Potency for every 10 cumulative Count he consumes, giving additional Power to his skills, converting his S3 to all {status:SuperCoin}s at 3+ Potency, and passively giving him {status:DefenseUp}. His S3 also gains {status:SuperCoin}s at less than 50% HP.

Using his defense skill at less than 15{status:Charge} Count immobilizes him on the next turn, but gives him damage reduction while immobilized, {status:ChargeForceField} and {status:Aggro} based on {status:Charge} Potency, and +10 {status:Charge} Count and +2 {status:Enhancement} on the succeeding turn. Additionally for each hit he takes while immobilized, he gains another {status:Charge} Count and 1 {status:ChargeLoad} on the next turn. It also gives him a free use of his S3 on the following turn guaranteeing that this sets up a full S3 with its conditionals.

His passive gives him shields based on his {status:Charge} Potency and increases damage dealt by his skills if they produce enough {status:Charge} to go over his max.
